cause.description:
Joseph Newman has created an energy machine that works using electro magnets and small battery. He use the battery and is able to power some device for 1:08 seconds and then he runs his machine which is turning a fan for over an hour with the same battery. he then takes that battery and puts it back into the device and it runs it for 2:36 seconds. the energy machine not only was able to power the fan but was able to recharge the battery.
he has done many tests with his machine but the patten office will not allow him to get a patten and therefor he cannot distribute this item without it getting stolen from him.
this is his site http://www.josephnewman.com/ and if you put Joseph Newman into youtube you will see man of the tests. he has hours of footage.
this is real and many scientists have singed affidavits saying it works although many don't understand how
PS this is not about donating so do not bother to just give a responce
1. I am willing to sign a pettion to get this thing a patten
2. i like it but i dont think it is real
3. whatever i dont care i have the money to waste on fules and i dont care about the envioment
cause.mission: get Joseph Newman's energy machine out to the public
cause.name: Free endless energy
